title: Peptide - T when rxn is favored given dG dH dS

content.prompt: Under which of the following temperature conditions is the reaction thermodynamically favored?

choices.label: It is only favored at high temperatures.
It is only favored at low temperatures.
It is not favored at any temperature.

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
